properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, INUM, EMAIL, GENDER, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, INUM, EMAIL, GENDER ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = ?, NICKNAME = ?, PHONE = ?, EMAIL = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT TB_MEMBER
FROM MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, INUM, EMAIL, GENDER, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS WHERE MEM_ID = ?
